channel.title: [317] Rune Evolution[317]
channel.description:
Hello, and welcome to the official beta of Rune Evolution 317. This server is 100% F2P with most of the dungeons actually working with correct npc's and requirements. Features will be included below. Don't have time for alot of pictures just get on and try it! (Client is really small).
[center][b]Features[/b]
[i][b]1. Player vs NPC[/b][/i]
[ul][*] Fully working Melee against NPC; with npc's defence against melee editable :P [*] Range works near 98% with arrows dropping at a random rate with caculations for bonuses and bow and arrows. [*] Magic is almost done besides autocasting which shouldn't be hard to add. Npc's can be edited to increase the amount they get hit from mage in a .cfg file.[/ul]
[i][b]2. Player vs Player[/b][/i]
[ul][*] Melee is pretty much complete besides the bonuses on some armor are whack and need edited. [*] Range has following, arrow dropping, etc. Just needs bonuses edited. [*] Mage is magnificent with 100% Starting to ending GFX's needs bonuses aswell though. [*] More features about PVP are that spells like Weaken, Curse, etc. actually do their job aswell as Entangle etc. All Weapon timers are calculated to the right time to ensure a great experience.[/ul]
[ul][b]Other Features:[/b] [*] Working TeleGrab [*] Prayer, and Potions Working [*] Most F2P dungeons are 100% Done [*] All Shops Are 100% RS Replicas [*] After beta going to be one of the best economies [*] Very Stable, and Safe [*] Lagfree (Once off my shitty desktop) [*] Bug tested daily and fixed as soon as bugs are located [*] Professional looking server overall regarding walking NPC's, Correct positioning etc.[/ul]
[b]Current Staff:[/b] [b]Owner: [img]http://i137.photobucket.com/albums/q232/LaundryLady1947/Runescape/mod_gold.gif[/img]Mod Josh (Skype™)[/b] [b]Co-Owner: [img]http://i137.photobucket.com/albums/q232/LaundryLady1947/Runescape/mod_gold.gif[/img]Mod Dustin (Doup22)[/b] [b]Administrators: None.[/b] [b]Moderators: None.[/b] [/center]
Please, the beta is now ready if you wish you can now test it out.. Follow the link here... Here are some picutures.. Enjoy..
[img]http://71.61.61.170/100mage.gif[/img]
[img]http://71.61.61.170/ranging.gif[/img]
[img]http://71.61.61.170/maging.gif[/img]
Beta closed due to lack of interest, however will remain a development blog.

item.title: [317] Rune Evolution[317]
item.dc:creator: @The_Chubby_Bunny The Chubby Bunny
item.description:
@The_Chubby_Bunny wrote:

[quote=“I Yaa I, post:16, topic:315770”][quote author=Skype link=topic=412230.msg3041197#msg3041197 date=1259118684]
This isn’t delta… Please, before you post actually think hmm… Maybe I could be a smartass and ASSUME it’s delta or I can look at it and see that it’s Devolution v7… It’s up to you.
[/quote]

I assumed this because you only use delta. Also, how can I ‘obviously’ see its Devolution .7?[/quote]
well if you pay attention to the flowers in the first screen shot, they’re a slightly higher resolution than any other server. I know, because I have my own resolution detecting application that was programmed in HTML code. Yeah, I come prepared.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Rune Evolution[317]
item.dc:creator: @Skype1 Skype™
item.description:
@Skype1 wrote:

Hello, and welcome to the official beta of Rune Evolution 317. This server is 100% F2P with most of the dungeons actually working with correct npc’s and requirements. Features will be included below. Don’t have time for alot of pictures just get on and try it! (Client is really small).

[center]Features

1. Player vs NPC

[ul][] Fully working Melee against NPC; with npc’s defence against melee editable
[] Range works near 98% with arrows dropping at a random rate with caculations for bonuses and bow and arrows.
[*] Magic is almost done besides autocasting which shouldn’t be hard to add. Npc’s can be edited to increase the amount they get hit from mage in a .cfg file.[/ul]

2. Player vs Player

[ul][] Melee is pretty much complete besides the bonuses on some armor are whack and need edited.
[] Range has following, arrow dropping, etc. Just needs bonuses edited.
[] Mage is magnificent with 100% Starting to ending GFX’s needs bonuses aswell though.
[] More features about PVP are that spells like Weaken, Curse, etc. actually do their job aswell as Entangle etc. All Weapon timers are calculated to the right time to ensure a great experience.[/ul]

[ul]Other Features:
[] Working TeleGrab
[] Prayer, and Potions Working
[] Most F2P dungeons are 100% Done
[] All Shops Are 100% RS Replicas
[] After beta going to be one of the best economies
[] Very Stable, and Safe
[] Lagfree (Once off my shitty desktop)
[] Bug tested daily and fixed as soon as bugs are located
[*] Professional looking server overall regarding walking NPC’s, Correct positioning etc.[/ul]

Current Staff:
Owner: Mod Josh (Skype™)
Co-Owner: Mod Dustin (Doup22)
Administrators: None.
Moderators: None.
[/center]

Please, the beta is now ready if you wish you can now test it out… Follow the link here… Here are some picutures… Enjoy…

Beta closed due to lack of interest, however will remain a development blog.
